Method.name: UserAction
Method.Implementation: #dim ec As %Status = $$$OK #dim menu As %Status = $Piece(Name, ",", 1) if menu '= "%SourceMenu", menu'="%SourceMenuContext" { quit $$$OK } set InternalName = ##class(Utils).NormalizeInternalName(InternalName) set ec = ##class(Utils).UserAction(InternalName, Name, .Target, .Action, .Reload) quit ec

Method.name: OnSourceMenuItem
OnSourceMenuContextItem
OnMenuItem
Method.Description: This is called for every menu item returned to Studio to allow the menu to be enabled/disabled without having to write a custom query for <query>MenuItems</query>. The <var>DisplayName</var> of this menu is also passed by reference and this may be modified to change the appearance of this menu item. The <var>MenuName</var> is the main menu name then the submenu name separated by a ','. If <var>Enabled</var> is set to -1 then it will remove this menu item from the list totally, 0 will gray the menu item out and the default 1 will display the menu item as normal.

Method.name: OnBeforeLoad
Method.Description: This is called before the actual load of data to give the chance to load the item from an external format.

Method.name: OnAfterSave
Method.Description: This is called after the item has been saved to the database. It may be passed a reference to the object representing the item just saved. It can be use to export this documement to an external form for example.

Method.name: OnAfterCompile
Method.Description: Called after the compile of the item is done.

Method.name: IsInSourceControl
Method.Description: Returns true if this item is in source control and false otherwise.
